biblStruct.note: In this paper the autor offers an state of art on the scriptural practice in Karshūnī, which appears to be the product of an Arabic acculturation process designed by the Arab-Islamic power, with the end result of a dual linguistic assimilation by the Christian communities under the dominant culture imposed by the Arab-Islamic state.
